attributes.action: After USA action in Venezuela the UK should’nt go to the World Cup & Olympics
attributes.additional_details: Because the US behaviour contradicts decent diplomatic behaviour
attributes.background: I want the government to withdraw from the Olympics and World Cup to protest UK behaviour in Venezuela

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is up to the Football Association, not the Government or Parliament, whether to take part in the World Cup. Deciding whether to participate in the Olympics is a matter for the British Olympic Association.
